one_reviews_text: This is a very good puzzle game to relax with to help feed those inner Tetris-related desires! Also has both bright and dark modes depending on preference. Only minor nitpick is that it's short. After just a little over 3 hours of play time I've already cleared 57 out of the 60 puzzles as of this review. Really hope to see some more added in the future! :) (Perhaps some with large quantities of smaller pieces?)
